trait.name: Magic Scent
entries: The arcanamite can pinpoint, by scent, the location of a creature that can cast spells within 60 feet of it.

trait.name: Reflective Carapace
entries: Any time the arcanamite is targeted by a magic missile spell, a line spell, or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 1 to 5, the arcanamite is unaffected. On a 6, the arcanamite is unaffected, and the effect is reflected back at the caster as though it originated from the arcanamite, turning the caster into the target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage, and the arcanamite can attach itself to the target. The arcanamite can be removed if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a {@dc 15} Strength check against it. The arcanamite detaches if it takes fire damage. Until the arcanamite detaches, it can't bite another target.

action.name: Leech Magic
entries: If the arcanamite is attached to a creature with spell slots, roll a {@dice d4}. The target loses a spell slot of that level, or the next highest level if it has no spell slots of that level. If the arcanamite has leeched a number of spell slots with a combined level of 8 or more, it detaches from the creature.
wip

trait.name: Aura of Misfortune
entries: Bad luck radiates from the beast in an aura with a 60-foot radius. Hostile creatures in that area have disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks and saving throws.

trait.name: Unfavorable Target
entries: The beast is unaffected by critical hits.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

A wolf-like creature with black fur, a long tail and big thin ears, flowing fur in its paws, and huge black feathers on top of his tail. These beasts are chaotic beings, with the power to bring misfortune to anyone who gets near them.

These creatures are known for its power to leave a path of accidents, bad luck, misfortune and random mischief, and they are always hunted from a distance to avoid step on its bad luck aura for getting too close to the beast.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The bullywug can breathe air and water.
Speak with Frogs and Toads. The bullywug can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

trait.name: Swamp Camouflage
entries: The bullywug has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The bullywug's long jump is up to 20 feet and it's high jump is to 10 feet, with or without a running start

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Change Shape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The bullywug magically polymorphs into a giant toad, remaining in that form for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics are replaced by the statistics of a giant toad, but it retains its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores. Any equipment it is wearing merges into the new form. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Bullywug Form Only)
headerEntries: The bullywug is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). The bullywug has the following druid spells prepared:

entries: wip

trait.name: Acid Blood
entries: A creature that hits the crawler with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage.

trait.name: Caustic Fumes
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the crawler must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the crawler's fumes for 24 hours.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Acid Spray (Recharge 6)
entries: The crawler spits acid in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
wip

monster.name: Chainer Geist
languages: any languages it knew in life

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The Geist can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The Geist can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Geist makes two attacks with its chains.

action.name: Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}) if the Geist isn't already grappling a creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The Geist enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.
wip

trait.name: Camouflage
entries: The chamaelean has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in natural terrain.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, the chamaelean can attempt to disarm the target, forcing it to drop one item of the chamaelean's choice that it's holding. The target must make a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the chamaelean takes the object and holds it with its tongue.
wip

action.name: Unmake
entries: The chronomancer choses one creature it can see within 60 feet of it, causing the target's flesh to rapidly age and decompose. The target must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Slow Projectile
entries: If the chronomancer is targeted by a ranged attack, it can alter the flow of time nearby, causing incoming projectiles to slow down. Until the start of its next turn, the chronomancer has a +10 bonus to AC against ranged attacks.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The chronomancer is a 9th-level
spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The chronomancer has the following wizard spells prepared:

entries: wip

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The chronomancer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Stretch Time (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The chronomancer can take on additional action on its turn.

action.name: Expose Paradox (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The chronomancer choses one creature it can see within 60 feet of it, revealing to it a paradox in the space-time continuum. The target must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Rewind
entries: When the chronomancer or another creature makes an attack roll, saving throw, or ability check, it must remake the roll and use the new result.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The chronomancer is a 20th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). The chronomancer has the following wizard spells prepared:

entries: wip

monster.name: Clockwork Dragon

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The dragon is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Self Destruct
entries: When the dragon is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage and 21 ({@damage 6d6}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit 15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Fire Tar Breath
items.entry: The dragon sprays flaming tar in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. On a failed save, a creature is {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 18}). While {@condition restrained} in this way, a creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

items.name: Knockout Gas Breath
items.entry: The dragon exhales knockout gas in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} for 10 minutes. This effect ends for a creature if the creature takes damage or someone uses an action to wake it.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.
wip

monster.name: Clockwork Pest
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Potent Injection (1/day)
entries: If the pest hits a creature with its stinger, it can inject a larger dose of poison. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 1 piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw, taking 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
wip

resist.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

trait.name: Wails of the Unborn
entries: Humanoids within 60 feet of the horror that can hear it have disadvantage on Constitution saving throws to maintain concentration.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The horror has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The horror can use its Gaze. It then makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Gaze
entries: The horror makes one gaze at random, choosing one target it can see within 60 feet of it.
1. Gaze of Agony. The target creature must make a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

2. Gaze of Lethargy. The target creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

3. Gaze of Despair. The target creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes overwhelmed with despair for 1 minute, and has disadvantage on attack rolls, saving throws, and ability checks. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
wip

trait.name: Perfect Mimicry
entries: The crowlock can mimic any sounds it has heard, including a person's voice. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom (Insight) check.

action.name: Mind Pierce
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 60/120 ft., one creature. Hit 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) psychic damage.
wip

resist.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Harden
entries: At the start of its turn, the elemental can choose to have disadvantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have disadvantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The elemental regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. If the elemental takes thunder damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the elemental's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two attacks with its crystal spear.

action.name: Crystal Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage.
wip

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Prismatic Immunity
entries: The dragon can use its bonus action to gain immunity to one of the following damage types: acid, cold, fire, or lightning. The immunity lasts until the dragon uses its ability again.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit 18 ({@damage 2d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Prismatic Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dragon exhales multicolored rays of light. Each creature in a 60-footcone must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw. For each target, roll a {@dice d8} to determine which color ray affects it.

items.name: 1 Red.
items.entry: The target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: 2 Orange.
items.entry: The target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: 3 Yellow.
items.entry: The target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: 4 Green.
items.entry: The target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: 5 Blue.
items.entry: The target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: 6 Indigo.
items.entry: On a failed save, the target is {@condition restrained}. It must then make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If it successfully saves three times, the effect ends. If it fails its save three times, it permanently turns to stone and is subjected to the {@condition petrified} condition.

items.name: 7 Violet.
items.entry: On a failed save, the target is {@condition blinded} for 1 minute.

items.name: 8 Special.
items.entry: The target is struck by two rays. Roll twice more, rerolling any 8.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.
wip

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The widow can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the widow knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The widow ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target is {@condition incapacitated} and takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
wip

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: The baneling explodes when it drops to 0 hit points. Each creature within 10 feet of it must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit 2 ({@damage 1d4}) acid damage.
wip

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The herald has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effect.

trait.name: Aura of Decay
entries: Negative energy radiates from the herald in an aura with 120-foot radius. Any creature in that area can't regain hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The herald makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or become diseased. While diseased in this way, the target takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the disease on a success.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Fetid Cloud (Recharge 5-6)
entries: A 20-foot-radius cloud of disease extends out from the herald. The cloud spreads around corners. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or become diseased. While diseased in this way, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not bot. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the disease on a success.
wip

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the pustuloid dies, it explodes in a burst of foul pus. Each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or become diseased. The diseased creature's skin rapidly develops painful pustules, and the creature has disadvantage on Constitution checks and Constitution saving throws.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Putrid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The pustuloid exhales a 15- foot cone of putrid gas. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
wip

resist.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

trait.name: Infernal Pact
entries: The devil can make an infernal pact with a willing creature, granting it special boons in exchange for its soul.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its horns.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Horns
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or lose 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an infernal wound. Each time the devil hits the wounded creature with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.
wip

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the anglerfish remains motionless in dim light or darkness, it appears as dancing lights that resemble floating lanterns.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The anglerfish can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, that creature is swallowed. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the anglerfish, and it takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the anglerfish's turns. The anglerfish can hold only one Huge creature or up to four Large or smaller creatures inside it at a time. If the anglerfish takes 20 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the anglerfish regurgitates all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 5 feet of the anglerfish. If the anglerfish dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.
wip

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/day)
entries: If the dream eater fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dream eater makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or gain one level of {@condition exhaustion}.

action.name: Terrorize (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dream eater emits nightmarish visions. Each creature within 10 feet of the dream eater must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the dream eater's next turn.

legendary.name: Dream Walk
entries: The dream eater magically teleports up to 40 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Deep Slumber (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dream eater targets one creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} for 8 hours. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.
wip

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the doll's darkvision.

trait.name: Inanimate
entries: While the doll remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from any ordinary doll.

trait.name: Undying Evil
entries: If the doll is destroyed, it regains all its hit points and reappears at a nearby location in 24 hours unless a remove curse spell is cast on its remains.

action.name: Giggle
entries: One creature of the doll's choice within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage and become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the doll is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The doll's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). The doll can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

entries: wip

trait.name: Corrupted Weapons
entries: The angel's weapons attacks are magical. When the angel hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@dice 4d8} necrotic damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The angel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The angel can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The angel makes two attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Vampiric Touch (3/Day)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage, and the angel regains hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The angel's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). The angel can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

entries: wip

entries: While the lizard remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal plant, such as a colorful fern.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Venomous Spittle (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The lizard spits a glob of venom at a creature it can see within 15 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the lizard's next turn.
wip

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The feyote has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The feyote has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The feyote's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. The feyote can cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/day)
entries: If the jarl fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The jarl makes two greataxe attacks.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage.

action.name: Rock

action.name: Flash Freeze (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The jarl stomps the ground, creating a wave of intense cold in a line that is 60 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If a target fails the saving throw, it becomes {@condition restrained} by ice. As an action, the {@condition restrained} target can make a {@dc 15} Strength check, breaking free of the ice on a success. The ice can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 15; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to poison and psychic damage).

legendary.name: Shove
entries: The jarl makes a shove attack.

legendary.name: Charge
entries: The jarl moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Battle Order
entries: The jarl directs an allied creature to strike, so long as the creature can see or hear the jarl. That creature can immediately use its reaction to make one weapon attack.

trait.name: Volatile Form
entries: When the elemental dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage, 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage, 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage, and 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@dice 2d8}) damage of a type chosen randomly from the following: acid, lightning, fire, or cold.

action.name: Hurl Energy
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit 18 ({@dice 2d8 + 9}) damage of a type chosen randomly from the following: acid, lightning, fire, or cold.

action.name: Elemental Chaos (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The elemental makes one elemental chaos attack at random.

items.name: 1 Earthquake.
items.entry: A seismic disturbance radiates from the elemental in a 100-foot radius circle. Each creature on the ground in that area must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. Each creature on the ground that is concentrating must also succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or break concentration. The area becomes difficult terrain after the earthquake.

items.name: 2 Fire Breath.
items.entry: The elemental exhales fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: 3 Tidal Wave.
items.entry: A massive wave emanates from the elemental. Each creature within 60 feet of the elemental must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 60 feet away from the elemental. On a success, the creature is pushed 10 feet away from the elemental.

items.name: 4 Whirlwind.
items.entry: The elemental summons a 10-foot-radius, 60-foot high whirlwind centered on a point within 120 feet of it. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) bludgeoning damage and is flung up to 40 feet away in a random direction and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes an object, such a wall or floor, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown to another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. If the saving throw is successful, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't flung away or knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Hurl Energy
entries: The elemental uses its Hurl Energy.

legendary.name: Harness Energy (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The elemental regains use of its Elemental Chaos.

legendary.name: Unstable Outburst (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The elemental loses control of its chaotic energies. Each creature within 30 feet of the elemental, including the elemental itself, must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or take 21 ({@dice 6d6}) damage of a type chosen randomly from the following: acid, lightning, fire, or cold. A creature takes half damage on a Success. The elemental has no immunity to the damage caused by this outburst.

trait.name: Sprinter
entries: The gazellean can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Alert
entries: The gazellean Has advantage on Dexterity checks for initiative. Additionally, the gazellean can't be surprised, and other creatures don't gain advantage on attack rolls against it as a result of being hidden from it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gazellean makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120, one target. Hit 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Leap Attack
entries: The froghoul doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it moves out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit 4 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage. The froghoul has advantage on this attack if the target is {@condition grappled} by it.

action.name: Tounge
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. Hit 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}) and pulled 10 feet toward the froghoul. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the tentaghoul must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the tentaghoul's Stench for 24 hours.

trait.name: Turning Defiance
entries: The tentaghoul and any ghouls within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The gill-man can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The gill-man regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the gill-man is {@condition poisoned}, this trait doesn't function. If the gill-man takes poison damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the gill-man's next turn. The gill-man dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Swimby
entries: The gill-man doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it swims out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Torpedo Attack
entries: If the gill-man swims at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8}) damage to the target.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gill-man makes two attacks with its claws.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The squirrel has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/day)
entries: If the squirrel fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The squirrel makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Monstrous Chatter (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The squirrel chatters furiously. Each creature within 60 feet of the squirrel and able to hear its chatter must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If a creature fails the saving throw, it becomes {@condition incapacitated} until the end of the squirrel's next turn.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The squirrel makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Trample (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The squirrel moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks. It can move through another creature's space but must end its movement in an unoccupied space. Each creature in the squirrel's path must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Might of Oaks (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The squirrel goes into a frenzy, uprooting nearby trees and disrupting the earth around it. Each creature on the ground within 20 feet of the squirrel must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The ground in that area becomes difficult terrain.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

trait.name: Aura of Malice
entries: All enemies within 10 feet of the gnoll have disadvantage on saving throws.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gnoll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its greatsword.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Conjure Fiends (1/Day)
entries: The gnoll magically summons {@dice 1d4} fiendish hyenas. The summoned fiends appear in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of their summoner and act as allies of their summoner. They remain for 10 minutes, until they or their summoner dies, or until their summoner dismisses them as an action.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The gnoll is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The gnoll has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the hyena reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the hyena can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

trait.name: Aura of Malice
entries: All enemies within 10 feet of the gnoll have disadvantage on saving throws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit 1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) bludgeoning damage

action.name: Alchemist's Fire (5/Day)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit The target is covered in flaming adhesive, and takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can end this damage by using its action to make a {@dc 10} Dexterity check to extinguish the flames.

action.name: Acid Vial (3/Day)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The goblin is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). The goblin has the following cleric spells prepared:

monster.name: Bone Golem

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit 18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bone Prison
entries: The golem targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. A prison of magical bones surrounds the creature. The target must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or become {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} creature can break free by succeeding on a {@dc 20} escape check, or by destroying the bone prison (AC 20; 50 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). The golem can only have one bone prison active at a time. It may dismiss the bone prison as a bonus action.

monster.name: Ice Golem

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Frozen Aura
entries: Intense cold radiates from the golem in an aura with a 20-foot radius. A creature that starts its turn in that area takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage. Additionally, the ground in the area is covered with slick ice, making it difficult terrain. When a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: The golem ignores difficult terrain caused by ice.

trait.name: Ice Death
entries: When the golem is reduced to 0 hit points, it shatters in an explosion of jagged ice. Each creature within 10 feet of it must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage and 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effect.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the grave titan to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the grave titan drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gnoll makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 29 ({@damage 6d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hurl Zombies
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit 30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage. After the attack hits or misses, {@dice 1d4 + 1} zombies arise adjacent to the target.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The guardian has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
Speak with Beasts and Plants. The guardian can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

trait.name: Tree Stride
entries: Once on its turn, the guardian can use 10 feet of its movement to step magically into one living tree within its reach and emerge from a second living three within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The guardian makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The guardian's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The guardian can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the hawkfox is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The hawkfox has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

trait.name: Nimble Action
entries: On each of its turns, the hawkfox can use a bonus action to take the Dash or Disengage action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hawkfox makes one bite attack and one talon attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit 8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Mounted Combatant
entries: The horseman can force an attack targeted at its mount to target itself instead.

trait.name: Ride-By
entries: While mounted, the horseman and its mount don't provoke opportunity attacks when they move out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The horseman makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Vorpal Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) slashing damage. When the horseman rolls a 20 on the attack roll, if the damage would reduce the creature to 0 hit points, the horseman cuts off the creature's head.

Jack-o'-lantern (Recharge 6). Ranged Weapon Attack: {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. Hit 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition stunned} until the end of the horseman's next turn.

trait.name: Alien Mind
entries: The butcher has advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

trait.name: Ingest Scion
entries: As a bonus action, the butcher can ingest an illet scion within 10 feet of it, destroying the scion. The butcher then regains use of Consume.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The butcher makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the butcher can't constrict another target.

action.name: Consume
entries: The butcher targets one creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, its body becomes a pile of white dust.

trait.name: Alien Mind
entries: The butcher has advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

entries: The butcher makes two fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the monitor can't constrict another target.

action.name: Spawn Scion (3/Day)
entries: The monitor spawns an illet scion that appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of it.

trait.name: Alien Mind
entries: The scion has advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the scion can't use its tentacles on another target.

trait.name: Alien Mind
entries: The devastator has advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

trait.name: Blighted Trail
entries: Terrain that the devastator passes over turns to white ash. Plants are destroyed in that area and cannot regrow for {@dice 1d10} days.

trait.name: Ingest Scion
entries: As a bonus action, the devastator can ingest an illet scion within 15 feet of it, destroying the scion. The devastator then regains 16 ({@dice 3d10}) hit points.
Scour from Existence. When the devastator reduces a creature to 0 hit points, that creature's body becomes a pile of white dust.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devastator makes four fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit 20 ({@damage 2d12 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Maddening Roar (Recharge 6)
entries: The devastator emits a mind-shattering roar. Each creature of the devastator's choice within 100 feet of it and able to hear the roar must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 44 ({@damage 8d10}) psychic damage and is afflicted with a short-term madness (Dungeon Master's Guide, page 259). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't afflicted with madness.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Zilladek fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Zilladek has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Zilladek's weapons attacks are magical.
Scour from Existence. When Zilladek reduces a creature to 0 hit points, that creature's body becomes a pile of white dust.

trait.name: Scour from Existence
entries: When Zilladek reduces a creature to 0 hit points, that creature's body becomes a pile of white dust.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Zilladek can use its Maddening Presence. It then makes six attacks: four with its fists, and two with its tentacles.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit 36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. Hit 28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Maddening Presence
entries: Each creature of Zilladek's choice within 120 feet of it and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or become afflicted with short-term madness (Dungeon Master's Guide, page 259). If a creature afflicted with short-term madness fails its saving throw, it becomes afflicted with longterm madness. If a creature afflicted with long-term madness fails its saving throw, it becomes afflicted with indefinite madness. If a creature afflicted with indefinite madness fails its saving throw, it dies from psychological trauma. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to Zilladek's Maddening Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Grip of Desolation
entries: Zilladek makes a fist attack. If the attack hits, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}) if it's a Huge or smaller creature and Zilladek doesn't have four other creatures {@condition grappled}.Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and takes {@dice 4d10} psychic damage at the start of each of its turns.

legendary.name: Transgress the Mind (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Zilladek casts phantasmal killer, no concentration required.

legendary.name: Titan's Presence (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Zilladek casts banishment.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Zilladek's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 22}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. Hit 21 ({@damage 6d6}) piercing damage, or 10 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

action.name: Infest (Recharge 6)
entries: One creature in the swarm's space must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or become infested by the swarm; the swarm then disappears inside the host, and the target is {@condition incapacitated} and loses control of its body. The swarm now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The swarm can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma. It otherwise uses the infested target's statics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features or proficiencies. The infestation lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the swarm ends it as a bonus action, or the swarm is forced out by an effect that removes disease like the lesser restoration spell. When the infestation ends, the swarm reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. The target is immune to this swarm's Infest for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the infestation ends.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the Kirin moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a horn attack on the same turn, the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the Kirin can make one hooves attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Horn
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition prone} creature. Hit 21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: The Kirin touches another creature with its snout. The target magically regains 11 ({@dice 2d8 + 2}) hit points. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target.

action.name: Teleport (1/Day)
entries: The Kirin magically teleports itself, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, to a location the Kirin is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.

trait.name: Pack Tactics

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Low Blow (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The kobold makes a cheap shot against a creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition incapacitated} until the end of the kobold's next turn.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensivity

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kraken can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kraken makes three tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with one use of Fling.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the kraken's turns.

If the kraken takes 25 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the kraken must succeed on a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the kraken. If the kraken dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Fling
entries: One medium or smaller object held or creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken is thrown up to 30 feet in a random direction and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Lightning Field (Recharge 5-6)
entries: All creatures within 60 feet of the kraken must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Tentacle Attack or Fling
entries: The kraken makes one tentacle attack or uses its Fling.

legendary.name: Release the Kraken (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kraken removes any magical effects on itself that reduce its speed or cause it to be {@condition restrained}, and escapes from any nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

legendary.name: Water Surge (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: A strong current surges from the kraken. Each creature within 30 feet of the kraken must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 30 feet away from the kraken. On a success, the creature is pushed 10 feet away from the kraken.

entries.name: Familiar
entries: The luck dragon can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a magic, telepathic bond with that willing companion. While the two are bonded, the companion can sense what the luck dragon senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. Additionally, while the luck dragon is within 10 feet of its companion, the companion shares the luck dragon's Dragon Luck feature. At any time and for any reason, the luck dragon can end its service as familiar, ending the telepathic bond.

action.name: Charm
entries: One humanoid the rusalka can see within 100 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} for 1 hour. The {@condition charmed} target must spend its turns trying to move as close to the rusalka as it can. The target can't take reactions, and for its action, it can use only the Dash action. If the target suffers any harm, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. If the target successfully saves against the effect, or if the effect ends, the target is immune to the rusalka's Charm for the next 24 hours. The rusalka can have only one target {@condition charmed} at a time. If it charms another, the effect on the previous target ends.
