entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The spider has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage, and the creature must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the cold damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target becomes frozen. A frozen creature is {@condition paralyzed}, and can thaw by spending 1 hour in warm temperature or taking 15 fire damage.

monster.name: Spellcrystal Dreadnought
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The dreadnought is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dreadnought has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Redirect Spells
entries: Whenever a spell is cast within 120 feet of the dreadnought that targets only one creature and doesn't have a range of self or touch, the dreadnought magically redirects the spell and becomes the target. If the spell could not normally affect the dreadnought, the spell fails. The creator of the dreadnought can designate creatures that won't be affected by this trait.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 10 ({@damage 2d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The skull has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the skull's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The skull is immune to effects that turn undead.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and the skull attaches to the target. If the target is Medium or smaller and the skull has advantage on the attack roll, it attaches on the target's face, and the target is also {@condition blinded} while the skull is attached in this way. While attached to the target, the skull can attack no other creature except the target but has advantage on its attack rolls. The skull's speed also becomes 0, and it moves with the target. A creature can detach the skull by making a successful {@dc 12} Strength check as an action. On its turn, the skull can detach itself from the target by using 5 feet of movement.

action.name: Kiss of Undeath (1/Day)
entries: If the skull is attached to a creature's face, it inserts its proboscis into the target mouth. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage and become {@condition poisoned} for one hour.

monster.name: Spirit
languages: any languages it knew in life

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The spirit can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material plane, and vice versa.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Withering Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The spirit enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

action.name: Scare (1/Day)
entries: One creature of the spirit's choice within 20 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the spirit is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The strix doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The strix has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see the strix's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of the strix, the strix can force it to make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw if the strix isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. A creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming {@condition petrified} on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic. Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the strix until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the strix in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.
If the strix sees itself reflected on a polished surface within 30 feet of it and in an area of bright light, the strix is affected by its own gaze.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The strix makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The swarm has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny squirrel. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. Hit 14 ({@damage 4d6}) piercing damage, or 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition prone}, becoming {@condition incapacitated} with laughter and unable to stand up until the end of the swarm's next turn.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the stalker can use its bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Deadly Aim
entries: The stalker deals an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8}) damage when it hits with a ranged weapon attack (included in the attack). Additionally its ranged attacks ignore half cover and three-quarters cover.

trait.name: Silent Sniper
entries: When the stalker is hidden from a creature, making a ranged weapon attack doesn't reveal its position.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The stalker makes three ranged attacks.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit 17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The boar has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the boar moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The boar regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the boar takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the boar's next turn. The boar dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Tusk
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Siege Beast
entries: The tuskaloth deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the tuskaloth moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the tuskaloth can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 22 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) piercing damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 31 ({@damage 4d10 + 9}) piercing damage.

action.name: Earthsake (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The tuskaloth pounds the ground with incredible force, causing a tremor. Each creature on the ground within 30 feet of the tuskaloth must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. The tremor also deals 50 bludgeoning damage to any structure in contact with the ground in that area. A structure that drops to 0 hit points collapses.

trait.name: Camouflage
entries: The verdalin has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in forest terrain.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ferdalin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}). The verdalin can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The vodyanoy can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vodyanoy makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Medium or smaller target, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and has disadvantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws, the vodyanoy tries to drown it, and the vodyanoy can't slam another target.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The vodyanoy's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}). The vodyanoy can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the titan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The titan has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The titan's weapons attacks are magical.

trait.name: Well-Armed
entries: The titan can make one reaction on every turn in a combat.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The titan makes two melee weapon attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Blade Storm (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The titan swings its weapons in a whirlwind of steel. Each creature within 10 feet of the titan must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) bludgeoning damage, 18 ({@damage 4d8}) piercing damage, and 18 ({@damage 4d8}) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The titan adds 5 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the titan must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The titan makes one attack.

legendary.name: War Cry (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Each creature within 120 feet of the titan must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 4d4}) psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Hold the Line (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The titan gains 26 ({@dice 4d12}) temporary hit points.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The werewolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the werewolf fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Pack leader
entries: The werewolf's allies have advantage on melee attack rolls against any hostile creature within 5 feet of the werewolf.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The werewolf can use its action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a wolf, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Multiattack (Hybrid Form Only)
entries: The werewolf makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only. Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.
Claws (Hybrid Form Only. Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) slashing damage.

legendary.name: Leap
entries: The werewolf moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Bark Orders
entries: The werewolf chooses a friendly creature who can see or hear it. That creature can use its reaction to move up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Frenzy (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The werewolf can make one claw attack against each creature within 5 feet of it.

monster.name: Wight Walker

resist.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Chilled Body
entries: A creature that touches the wight or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wight makes two battleaxe attacks. It can use its Life Drain in place of one battleaxe attack.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the wight's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The wight can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

action.name: Frost Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The wight exhales a blast of frosty wind in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) cold damage on a failed sav, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the ape is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Monkey Grip
entries: The ape can wield a two-handed weapon in one hand.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ape makes two attacks: one with its fist and one with its greatsword.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 25/50 ft., one target. Hit 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The Sprite has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Icesickle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit 1 slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage and then be {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the sprite's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sprite's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Mind Lash
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. Hit 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage and the creature has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws until the end of the enchanter's next turn.

reaction.name: Invoke Doubt
entries: If the enchanter is the target of an attack and can see the attacker, it imposes disadvantage on the attack roll.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The enchanter is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The enchanter knows the following sorcerer spells:

trait.name: Enthralling Aura
entries: Attack rolls against the mind sculptor have disadvantage.

action.name: Melt Mind
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 9} to hit, range 60/120 ft., one creature. Hit 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage and the creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition stunned} until the end of the mind sculptor's next turn.

action.name: Pacify
entries: The mind sculptor targets one creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed}. The {@condition charmed} creature can't attack or otherwise harm another creature. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. The mind sculptor can have only one target {@condition charmed} at a time in this way. If it charms another, the effect on the previous target ends.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mind sculptor is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). The mind sculptor knows the following sorcerer spells:

trait.name: Crossbow Expert
entries: The trapper ignores the loading quality on crossbows. Additionally, being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on its ranged attack rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The trapper makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Conjure Bolas (Recharge 5-6)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/60, one target. Hit 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition restrained} for 1 minute (escape {@dc 13}).

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The hunter's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Skilled Tracker
entries: The hunter magically knows the distance to and direction of its quarry, so long as the creature is within 50 miles of the hunter.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The trapper makes two melee attacks or three ranged attacks.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) force damage.

action.name: Multishot (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The hunter unleashes a magical volley of arrows in a 90-foot cone. The hunter can make a longbow attack against each creature in that area, dealing an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) force damage on a hit. A creature hit by an attack in this way must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the hunter's turn.

trait.name: Nimble Action
entries: On each of its turns, the pirate can use a bonus action to take the Dash or Disengage action.

trait.name: Weapon Juggler
entries: The pirate can draw and wield up to three one-handed weapons.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pirate makes two melee attacks or three ranged attacks with thrown weapons.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pirate makes three attacks: two with its chain and one with its hook.

action.name: Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the pirate can attempt to trip the target. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Hook
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the pirate can attempt to disarm the target, forcing it to drop one item of the pirate's choice that it's holding. The target must make a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, it drops the chosen object. The object lands at its feet.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the killer can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: The killer has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

trait.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the killer takes 20 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit points instead.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the killer surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The killer makes three melee attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or lose 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to a bleeding wound. Each time the killer hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

Each time the killer hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). trait.name: Unarmored Defense

action.name: Fire Jab

action.name: Three Point Strike (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The initiate makes three unarmed strike against one target. If two attacks hit, the target is {@condition incapacitated}. If three attacks hit, the target is {@condition stunned}. These conditions last until the end of the initiate's next turn.

reaction.name: Block
entries: The initiate adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the initiate must see the attacker.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the master is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

entries: The master makes three attacks: two with its unarmed strike and one with its fire kick.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Fury of the Five Spires (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The master makes five unarmed strike against one target. The target must then make a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw with a +1 DC for every attack that hit. On a failed save the target is knocked {@condition unconscious} until the end of the master's next turn.

reaction.name: Fiery Block
entries: The master adds 5 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the initiate must see the attacker. If the attack misses, the attacker takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage plus 17 ({@damage 5d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Summon Demon (1/Day)
entries: The priest attempts to magically summon a Herald of Rot with a 40 percent chance of success. The summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 10 minutes, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The rat hermit has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Rat Telepathy
entries: The rat hermit can magically command any rat within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

trait.name: Vermin Shield
entries: Whenever the rat hermit is hit by an attack, as a reaction it can have an allied rat or swarm of rats within 5 feet become the target of the attack instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The rat hermit makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Call the Swarm (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The rat hermit magically calls a swarm of rats. The called creatures arrive in 1 round, acting as allies of the rat hermit and obeying its commands.

entries: The dog has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or
smell.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: When the dog is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit 8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Brave
entries: The paladin has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Mounted Combatant
entries: The paladin can force an attack targeted at its mount to target itself instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The paladin makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lay on Hands (1/Day)
entries: The paladin can touch a creature to restore 25 hit points of that creature. Additionally, the touch cures the target of one disease or neutralizes one poison affecting it.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The paladin adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the paladin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The paladin is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (save {@dc 14}). The paladin has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Nimble Action
entries: On each of its turns, the dancer can use a bonus action to take the Dash or Disengage action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dancer makes three melee attacks: two with its scimitar and one with its whip.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hymn of Battle
entries: As an action, the dancer begins to sing a song that magically boosts its attacks. Whenever the dancer makes an attack roll while singing, it can add a {@dice d4} to its roll. The dancer can maintain concentration to continue singing the song. If it loses concentration, the song ends.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The dancer adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the dancer must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Rhythmic Fighting
entries: The dirge can play songs while wielding a melee weapon in one hand.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dirge makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit 6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Thunderous Crescendo
entries: As a bonus action, the dirge begins to play a magical song. At the start of each of the dirge's turns, all enemy creatures within 30 feet of the dirge that can hear the song must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) thunder damage. Any creature that takes damage in this way loses concentration if it's concentrating. The dirge can maintain concentration to continue playing the song. If it loses concentration, the song ends.
